title: Penzone: No Sheriff's Office raises; Tent City decision coming soon

organizations.name: nick oza/the republic new maricopa county sheriff paul penzone

text: Penzone: No Sheriff's Office raises; Tent City decision coming soon New Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone sworn in Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone takes the oath of office from Judge Mary Murguia of the 9th U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals. David Kadlubowski/The Republic New Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone sworn in Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone speaks to his supporters after taking the oath of office at the Heard Museum in Phoenix on Jan. 4, 2017. David Kadlubowski/The Republic New Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone sworn in Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone takes the oath of office from Judge Mary Murguia of the 9th U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals as his son, Austin, and wife, Veronica, look on at the Heard Museum in Phoenix on Jan. 4, 2017. David Kadlubowski/The Republic New Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone sworn in Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone speaks to his supporters after taking the oath of office at the Heard Museum in Phoenix on Jan. 4, 2017. David Kadlubowski/The Republic New Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone sworn in Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone takes the oath of office from Judge Mary Murguia of the 9th U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals while his son, Austin, and wife, Veronica, look on at the Heard Museum in Phoenix on Jan. 4, 2017. David Kadlubowski/The Republic New Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone sworn in Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone prior to taking the oath of office at the Heard Museum in Phoenix on Jan. 4, 2017. David Kadlubowski/The Republic New Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone sworn in Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone prior to taking the oath of office at the Heard Museum in Phoenix on Jan. 4, 2017. David Kadlubowski/The Republic New Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone sworn in Judge Mary Murguia swears in new Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone, who was accompanied with his wife, Veronica and son, Austin, at the Board of Supervisors Auditorium on Jan 4, 2017. Nick Oza/The Republic New Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone sworn in Paul Penzone and his wife, Veronica. Nick Oza/The Republic New Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone sworn in New Maricopa County Recorder Adrian Fontes and Paul Penzone, the new sheriff, take selfies before they are sworn in at the Board of Supervisors Auditorium on Jan 4, 2017. Nick Oza/The Republic New Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone sworn in Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone's mother, Rosemary, gives him a kiss while his father, Charles, watches at his swearing-in at the Board of Supervisors Auditorium on Jan 4, 2017. Nick Oza/The Republic New Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone sworn in Paul Penzone's mother, Rosemary, watches her son be sworn in as Maricopa County's new sheriff at the Board of Supervisors Auditorium on Jan 4, 2017. Nick Oza/The Republic New Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone sworn in Maricopa County Paul Penzone and County Attorney Bill Montgomery talk before they are sworn in at the Board of Supervisors Auditorium on Jan 4, 2017. Nick Oza/The Republic New Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone sworn in Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone at his swearing-in at the Board of Supervisors Auditorium on Jan 4, 2017.
